downloadDescription: In this update, we introduce an additional dataset to support the novel task of Image Grounded Conversation (IGC), an extension of Visual Question Generation (VQG), now in the context of a conversation.
detailsSection: Given an image, the system should 'ask a natural and engaging question' and furthermore, the system should give a natural and interesting response to the question, as a turn in an ongoing conversation. This dataset (IGC) includes image-grounded conversations consisting of an image, a question, a response, and up to four further responses, which together constitute a conversation. In addition, we provide up to four additional questions that could have been asked, and up to four additional responses to a first question, so that the diversity of possible questions and answers can be studied. We provide a test set and a development set, each with approximately 5K images. This dataset is described in https://arxiv.org/abs/1701.08251.
systemRequirementsSection: • Windows 8, Windows 10, Android, Apple Mac OS X
